Airline safety and security information

This site is your source for information about recent plane crashes, as well as about security issues such as what is allowed in your checked and carry-on bags. Below are links to some of the key sections of the site.

Fear of Flying Resources

Find out more about fear of flying and how to deal with it.

Travel Partners
Perhaps you want to know more about the fear of flying from the eyes of a veteran airline captain, or advice on Shipping art by air as a means to promote such efforts. If you want to move beyond the typical airline trip, consider some Private Jet Charter options, but only after making your breakfast on any number of Small Kitchen Products. You can find a range of other articles at the AirSafe.com Journal page.
